name: Enigmatis: The Shadow of Karkhala (Full) - Hidden
name_original: Enigmatis: The Shadow of Karkhala (Full) - Hidden
description:
Unlock the complete adventure with a single purchase! No in-app purchases!

You’ve tracked the evil Preacher all over the world to thwart his dark plans, but now this journey has brought you to a secret monastery high up in the Himalayan Mountains. Could this remote mountain in Tibet be the site of your final showdown, or will this villain finally complete his mission to bring a demon back to this world? There’s no telling what you’ll find in the shadow of Karkhala!

• THE PATH AHEAD CAN BE TREACHEROUS
This mysterious temple holds the key to the Preacher unleashing this terrible power. But it might also hold the key to stopping him, if you can brave the heights!

• STOP THE DEMON’S RESURRECTION!
Prevent this catastrophe through a variety of mystical hidden object scenes.

• CAN YOU DEFEAT THE FINAL REAPER?
Battle your ancient foe by solving complex puzzles and intriguing mini-games.

• CONTINUE THE FIGHT BETWEEN GOOD AND EVIL IN THE BONUS CHAPTER
Another adventure awaits, along with additional Collector’s Edition exclusives including collectible Feathers, morphing objects, and more!
